dating_system.reference_point: Battle of Yavin (Death Star destruction) = Year 0

events.name: Formation of the Je'daii Order
events.description: The Tho Yor ships gather Force-sensitives from across the galaxy to Tython, forming the first Force-using order.
events.outcome: Establishment of the Je'daii Order and the foundation of Force study

events.name: Infinite Empire Peak
events.description: The Rakatan Infinite Empire reaches its peak, enslaving numerous worlds including Korriban.
events.outcome: Rakata dominate the galaxy using Force-based technology

events.name: Force Wars
events.description: Massive conflict between light and dark side Je'daii factions leads to the destruction of Tython.
events.outcome: Je'daii Order splits, leading to the formation of Jedi and Sith

events.name: Formation of the Jedi Order
events.description: The light side Je'daii survivors establish the Jedi Order on Ossus.
events.outcome: Jedi Order established as guardians of peace and justice

events.name: Formation of the Sith
events.description: Dark side Je'daii survivors discover Korriban and enslave the Sith species, becoming the Sith Lords.
events.outcome: Birth of the Sith as dark side Force users

events.name: Formation of the Galactic Republic
events.description: Core worlds unite to form the Galactic Republic with Coruscant as its capital.
events.outcome: Establishment of the Republic government that would last 25,000 years

events.name: Great Hyperspace War
events.description: First major conflict between the Galactic Republic and the ancient Sith Empire.
events.outcome: Republic victory; Sith Empire destroyed; survivors flee to Unknown Regions

events.name: Great Sith War
events.description: War caused by fallen Jedi Exar Kun and Ulic Qel-Droma's embrace of the dark side.
events.outcome: Jedi victory but at great cost; Ossus devastated; near-extinction of Sith knowledge

events.name: Mandalorian Wars Begin
events.description: Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders under Mandalore the Ultimate begin their conquest of the Outer Rim.
events.outcome: Beginning of a 16-year war that would reshape the galaxy

events.name: Revan Enters the Mandalorian Wars
events.description: Jedi Knight Revan defies the Jedi Council and enters the Mandalorian Wars with a third of the Jedi Order.
events.outcome: Revan becomes Supreme Commander; turning point in the war

events.name: Battle of Malachor V
events.description: Final battle of the Mandalorian Wars where Revan activates the Mass Shadow Generator.
events.outcome: Mandalorian defeat; Malachor V destroyed; many Jedi die or are broken

events.name: Jedi Civil War Begins
events.description: Revan and Malak return as Sith Lords, leading a massive fleet against the Republic.
events.outcome: Beginning of the Jedi Civil War; Republic on the defensive

events.name: Capture of Darth Revan
events.description: Malak betrays Revan during a Jedi strike team assault; Revan's mind is wiped by the Jedi Council.
events.outcome: Revan captured and mind-wiped; Malak becomes Dark Lord of the Sith

events.name: Discovery of the Star Forge
events.description: The redeemed Revan discovers the ancient Rakatan Star Forge, source of the Sith fleet's power.
events.outcome: Location of Star Forge revealed; key to ending the war discovered

events.name: Death of Darth Malak
events.description: Revan confronts and defeats his former apprentice Malak aboard the Star Forge.
events.outcome: End of Jedi Civil War; Star Forge destroyed; Malak redeemed in death

events.name: Revan's Disappearance
events.description: Revan leaves known space to confront a greater threat in the Unknown Regions.
events.outcome: Revan disappears; Republic left without its greatest hero

events.name: First Jedi Purge
events.description: Sith Triumvirate begins systematic hunt of surviving Jedi across the galaxy.
events.outcome: Jedi Order nearly extinct; only a handful survive in hiding

events.name: Return of the Jedi Exile
events.description: Meetra Surik returns from exile to help rebuild the Jedi Order.
events.outcome: Sith Triumvirate defeated; foundation laid for Jedi Order's restoration

events.name: Defeat of the Sith Triumvirate
events.description: Meetra Surik defeats the three Sith Lords who nearly destroyed the Jedi Order.
events.outcome: End of First Jedi Purge; Sith threat temporarily ended

events.name: Return of the Sith Empire
events.description: The True Sith Empire returns from the Unknown Regions under Emperor Vitiate.
events.outcome: Sith Empire reestablished; preparation for war with Republic begins

events.name: Great Galactic War Begins
events.description: The renewed Sith Empire launches a massive assault on the Galactic Republic.
events.outcome: Beginning of a decades-long galactic war

events.name: Reclamation of Korriban
events.description: Sith Empire reclaims their ancestral homeworld from Republic forces.
events.outcome: Korriban becomes Sith capital again; Sith Academy reestablished

events.name: Alderaan Civil War
events.description: Noble houses of Alderaan fight for control of the throne.
events.outcome: Ongoing conflict weakens Alderaan's role in galactic politics

events.name: Sacking of Coruscant
events.description: Sith Empire launches surprise attack on the Republic capital while peace negotiations occur on Alderaan.
events.outcome: Jedi Temple destroyed; Senate forced to accept unfavorable peace terms

events.name: Treaty of Coruscant
events.description: Forced peace treaty between Republic and Sith Empire after the Sacking of Coruscant.
events.outcome: Cold War period begins; galaxy divided between Republic and Empire

events.name: Cold War Period Begins
events.description: Tense peace between Republic and Empire with proxy conflicts across the galaxy.
events.outcome: Period of rebuilding and preparation for renewed conflict

events.name: The Old Republic Era Conflicts
events.description: Various heroes emerge on both sides as the Cold War escalates into open conflict.
events.location: Tython, Korriban, Coruscant, Dromund Kaas, and beyond
events.outcome: Individual heroic storylines shape the fate of the galaxy

events.name: Defeat of the Sith Emperor
events.description: Jedi Knight defeats Emperor Vitiate's physical form on Dromund Kaas.
events.outcome: Emperor's body destroyed but his spirit survives

events.name: Liberation of Revan
events.description: Revan is freed from 300 years of imprisonment by the Sith Emperor.
events.outcome: Revan's physical form dies but his spirit splits between light and dark

events.name: Hutt Cartel Crisis
events.description: Hutt Cartel attempts to conquer Makeb using isotope-5.
events.outcome: Makeb evacuated; isotope-5 crisis resolved

events.name: Arkanian Legacy Crisis
events.description: Discovery of ancient Rakatan technology threatens galactic stability.
events.outcome: Ancient technology secured and contained

events.name: Final Defeat of Revan
events.description: Revan's spirit is finally laid to rest on Yavin 4.
events.outcome: Revan achieves peace; threat to galaxy eliminated

events.name: Shadow of Revan Campaign
events.description: Joint Republic-Imperial operation against a cult claiming to follow Revan's teachings.
events.outcome: Revan cult defeated; temporary cooperation between Republic and Empire

events.name: Zakuul Invasion Begins
events.description: The Eternal Empire of Zakuul conquers both Republic and Sith Empire.
events.outcome: Both Republic and Empire fall; Eternal Empire dominates galaxy

events.name: The Outlander Awakens
events.description: A hero awakens from carbonite freezing to lead the Alliance against Zakuul.
events.outcome: Alliance formed to resist Eternal Empire

events.name: Defeat of Valkorion
events.description: The Outlander defeats the Immortal Emperor Valkorion and frees the galaxy.
events.outcome: Eternal Empire falls; Republic and Empire begin to recover

events.name: Republic-Empire War Resumes
events.description: With Zakuul defeated, the ancient conflict between Republic and Empire reignites.
events.outcome: Renewed galactic war with uncertain outcome

events.name: New Sith Wars Begin
events.description: Series of conflicts between Jedi and Sith lasting 1,000 years.
events.outcome: Beginning of millennium-long conflict

events.name: Seventh Battle of Ruusan
events.description: Final battle of the New Sith Wars where Darth Bane implements the Rule of Two.
events.outcome: Sith extinct except for Bane; Rule of Two established

events.name: Ruusan Reformation
events.description: Major reorganization of the Republic after the end of the New Sith Wars.
events.outcome: Republic demilitarized; Jedi become peacekeepers

events.name: Birth of Darth Plagueis
events.description: The Muun who would become Darth Plagueis the Wise is born.
events.outcome: Future Sith Lord who would discover midi-chlorian manipulation

events.name: Birth of Sheev Palpatine
events.description: The future Emperor Palpatine is born on Naboo.
events.outcome: Birth of the man who would destroy the Republic and Jedi

events.name: Palpatine Becomes Darth Sidious
events.description: Palpatine murders his family and becomes apprentice to Darth Plagueis.
events.outcome: Palpatine embraces the dark side and begins his rise to power

events.name: Birth of Anakin Skywalker
events.description: The Chosen One is born on Tatooine, conceived by the Force.
events.outcome: Birth of the one prophesied to bring balance to the Force

events.name: Death of Darth Plagueis
events.description: Darth Sidious kills his master Plagueis on the night of his election as Chancellor.
events.outcome: Sidious becomes the sole Sith Lord and Chancellor of the Republic

events.name: Invasion of Naboo
events.description: Trade Federation invades Naboo, leading to the discovery of Anakin Skywalker.
events.outcome: Darth Maul killed; Anakin discovered and trained; Palpatine becomes Chancellor

events.name: Clone Wars Begin
events.description: First Battle of Geonosis marks the beginning of the Clone Wars.
events.outcome: Galaxy-wide civil war begins; Jedi become generals

events.name: Order 66 and Jedi Purge
events.description: Emperor Palpatine orders the extermination of the Jedi Order.
events.outcome: Jedi Order destroyed; Galactic Empire established

events.name: Galactic Empire Established
events.description: Palpatine declares himself Emperor, transforming the Republic into the Empire.
events.outcome: End of democracy; beginning of Imperial tyranny

events.name: Birth of Luke and Leia
events.description: The children of Anakin Skywalker are born and separated for their protection.
events.outcome: New hope for the galaxy is born; future Jedi hidden from Empire

events.name: Battle of Scarif
events.description: Rebel Alliance steals Death Star plans in their first major victory.
events.outcome: Death Star plans obtained; key to Death Star's destruction discovered

events.name: Battle of Yavin
events.description: Luke Skywalker destroys the Death Star, marking the Rebellion's greatest victory.
events.outcome: Death Star destroyed; major blow to Imperial power; Luke begins Jedi path

events.name: Battle of Hoth
events.description: Imperial forces discover and attack the Rebel base on Hoth.
events.outcome: Rebels forced to evacuate; Luke begins training with Yoda

events.name: Luke Learns Vader is His Father
events.description: Darth Vader reveals to Luke that he is his father during their lightsaber duel.
events.outcome: Luke learns the truth about his parentage; foundation for redemption arc

events.name: Battle of Endor
events.description: Final confrontation between Empire and Rebellion; Emperor and Vader die.
events.outcome: Empire defeated; Emperor and Vader dead; galaxy freed

events.name: New Republic Established
events.description: Rebel Alliance formally reorganizes into the New Republic government.
events.outcome: Democratic government restored; beginning of post-Imperial era

events.name: Battle of Jakku
events.description: Final major battle between Empire and New Republic forces.
events.outcome: Imperial defeat; end of Galactic Civil War

events.name: Luke's Jedi Academy Established
events.description: Luke Skywalker establishes a new Jedi training academy.
events.outcome: Beginning of new Jedi Order; Force users trained again

events.name: Birth of Ben Solo
events.description: Son of Han Solo and Leia Organa is born, destined to become Kylo Ren.
events.outcome: Birth of future leader of First Order and eventual redeemed Jedi

events.name: Fall of Ben Solo
events.description: Ben Solo turns to the dark side and destroys Luke's Jedi academy.
events.outcome: New Jedi Order destroyed; Luke goes into exile; Ben becomes Kylo Ren

events.name: Rise of the First Order
events.description: Imperial remnants reorganize as the First Order in the Unknown Regions.
events.outcome: New Imperial-style government emerges to threaten the New Republic

events.name: The Force Awakens
events.description: Rey discovers her Force abilities; First Order destroys the New Republic capital.
events.outcome: Starkiller Base destroyed; Luke's location revealed; new hope emerges

events.name: The Last Jedi
events.description: Rey trains with Luke; Resistance fights First Order; Luke sacrifices himself.
events.outcome: Luke becomes one with the Force; Resistance survives; Rey continues training

events.name: The Rise of Skywalker
events.description: Emperor Palpatine returns; Rey and Ben Solo unite to defeat the Final Order.
events.outcome: Palpatine finally destroyed; Ben Solo redeemed; Rey dies but is revived
